summary: A tale of revenge, honor and greed follows a group of misfits that gets involved with a kitchen cleaver made from the top five swords of the martial arts world in this wild and brash action comedy.
cast: Masanobu Andô|Swanson Han|Xiaoye Liu|Hou Xiang|Ashton Xu|Benchang You|Yuqi Zhang
title: Dao jiàn xiào
